sentences.english: And light multitaskers might be better at preserving their attention.

sentences.english: Odontoid fracture could not be shown with CT if without atlantoaxial dislocation.

sentences.english: Even a mild case of dehydration can reduce your mental energy and capacity, causing your memory to become impaired.

sentences.english: In the case of rimming steel, no or some deoxidation is carried out before casting.

sentences.english: Children with mild myopic amblyopia achieved better effect if they wore spectacles before 9-years old.

sentences.english: This type of patient may be associated with extraocular muscle weakness or mild limb weakness.
